title: Sorry We're Skating
A cheeky monkey
Pau's first football match
excerpt:
Pau is now an officially federated football player, signed to FC Rialp. This was his first game, at home against Balaguer.



He played two quarters, initially in defence, but soon drifted forward, to much better effect.



He’s much happier runni...
content:
Pau is now an officially federated football player, signed to FC Rialp. This was his first game, at home against Balaguer.



He played two quarters, initially in defence, but soon drifted forward, to much better effect.



He’s much happier running at defenders with the ball at his feet.





He took a nice free kick.



Rialp won 3-2 in the end, with Pau scoring twice on his debut.



Well played Pau!

Pau climbing up an abandoned building.



Standing on top of the big gun.

title: Removing the safety railing from the balcony
excerpt:
Everyone is now big enough that they can’t fit through the railings of the balcony, so it’s time to remove the safety barrier.

Boí did the work to remove it, since it was for his safety that we put it up in 2017.



Here he is almost seven years ...
content:
Everyone is now big enough that they can’t fit through the railings of the balcony, so it’s time to remove the safety barrier.

Boí did the work to remove it, since it was for his safety that we put it up in 2017.



Here he is almost seven years ago.



He did a good job.





We wrote about the balcony railings before:
https://mananamanana.com/ohpiglet/boi-likes-to-go-out-on-the-balcony-every-morning/
https://mananamanana.com/ohpiglet/boi-likes-to-walk-around-on-the-balcony/
https://mananamanana.com/ohpiglet/we-missed-this-one-nail-in-the-balcony-railing-so/

title: Mama and Papa go on holidays, skiing
excerpt:
Mama and Papa go on holidays with each other and with no children, for perhaps the first time in 12 years.

The road was blocked for avalanche risk so they had to ski to the hotel.



Beautiful snowy scenery.



A lovely hotel, a comfy couch.



A...
content:
Mama and Papa go on holidays with each other and with no children, for perhaps the first time in 12 years.

The road was blocked for avalanche risk so they had to ski to the hotel.



Beautiful snowy scenery.



A lovely hotel, a comfy couch.



A relaxing time to read seasonal literature.
